This is a fun and entertaining shooter that offers a very satisfying experience. However, Global Offensive improves on the game in many ways and has far more people playing it so if you have not bought any Counter Strike games, get Counter Strike: GO (it's even cheaper than Source in the Steam Store).

Counter Strike: Source plays very smoothly and the game controls exceptionally well. Unlike Counter Strike: GO, there is no matchmaking so you just have to select which game you want to join. Very often these games will be modded in various ways so some may find it frustrating that it can be difficult to locate a normal match. However, since there are not as many people playing this game as the newer one, the system for joining games works fine. The game is also the last Counter Strike game to date to feature custom sprays. These allow players to decorate the map with amusing images but this ability is sometimes abused and inappropriate images are used so just be aware.

If you have played a lot of Global Offensive, you might want to take a look at Source. It is a very good game but I still recommend just getting Counter Strike: GO if you do not have it.

Gameplay: 8/10
Graphics: 7/10 (for the time)
Controls: 8/10
Replay Value: 7/10
A hell of a game. A bit to old nowadays as you may consider playing CS:GO instead, but lives up to it's name!

Counter-Strike: Source is a remake of Counter-Strike using the Source game engine. As in the original, Counter-Strike: Source pits a team of counter-terrorists against a team of terrorists in a series of rounds. Each round is won either by completing an objective (such as detonating a bomb or rescuing hostages) or by eliminating all members of the enemy team.

Counter-Strike: Source retains its team-based objective-orientated first-person shooter style gameplay. The aim of playing a map is to accomplish a map's objective: defusing the bomb, rescuing all hostages, or killing the entire opposing team. The ultimate goal of the game is to win more rounds than the opposing team. Once players are killed, they do not respawn until the next round, though this depends on which server people play on. This gameplay feature distinguishes Counter-Strike from other first-person shooter games, where players respawn instantly or after a short delay.

Shooting while moving dramatically decreases accuracy, and holding the trigger down to continuously shoot produces severe recoil. The severity of damage induced by weaponry is dependent upon the specific locations of hits, with hits to the head being most lethal and shots which make contact elsewhere causing lesser loss of health. Damage is also affected by the distance a lot, and if the target wears protection.
navy is in this game. and the cv and the buy ur ammo as well

Counter Strike Source ist die gelungene Fortsetzung von Counter Strike. Grafik, Sound und Handling wurden aufgemotzt und optimiert und viele neue Maps wurden integriert. Auch die vielen neuen downloadbaren Maps aus dem Workshop machen viel Freude und im Internet findet man sehr leicht neue Spielgefährten. Wenn einmal keine Freunde oder Partner zur Verfügung stehen kann man auch gegen Bots spielen die in verschiedenen Schwierigkeitsstufen zum Gefecht bereit stehen. Fazit: Sehr gut gemachter Single und Multiplayer Spaß für Jung und Alt. Ein echtes Meisterwerk das auch schon für wenig Geld zu haben ist.

COUNTER-STRIKE: SOURCE... A continuação de um clássico!

Produzido pela Valve Software e lançado oficialmente em 7 de outubro de 2004, Counter-Strike: Source é um jogo de tiro em primeira pessoa, sendo o sucessor do tão popular "Counter-Strike 1.6" e "Condition Zero". Para alavancar as vendas de Half-Life 2, a VALVe usou os seus direitos com a série Counter-Strike para criar uma versão melhorada, com a redução de alguns erros clássicos e novos gráficos, utilizando o novo motor gráfico "SOURCE". 

De início o Counter-Strike: Source não tinha muitos jogadores e servidores, principalmente por que o jogo ficou restringido apenas aos compradores de Half-Life 2. Mas com o tempo o jogo foi ganhando força, novos mapas, suportes e assim sua comunidade foi crescendo. Após a liberação do jogo para venda e a divulgação com altas notas na imprensa especializada, novos servidores surgiram, migrando uma boa parte dos jogadores da versão anterior.

ANÁLISE CRÍTICA	NOTA (0-10)
Multiplayer	9,8
Gráficos	8,8
Jogabilidade	9,2
Experiência de Jogo	9,0
Diversão	9,5

MÉDIA FINAL: 9,2 

Counter-Strike: Source é um ótimo jogo e com evoluções consideráveis ótimas. Sem dúvida nenhuma manteve o incrível legado da franquia COUNTER-STRIKE e não deixa de desapontar. Se você ainda não teve a oportunidade de desfrutar este jogo, não perca mais tempo e compre logo. Até a próxima análise, se cuidem e tchau tchau!

Читеров не нашел за свои на данный момент почти 70 часов в игре,коммьюнити на 95% доброе,даже те же самые 7+ лет школьники ведут себя вполне адекватно,механика стрельбы мне реально нравится,особенно у дробовиков,если потренироваться немного с каким то оружием,можно стать практически неубиваемым,но есть и дикая имба,не буду про скорострелки,а про L96(авп).С ней любой рак сможет отстрелить всей тиме врага яйца и не заметить,лично я с ней недавно набил киллстрик в 30 убийств,чего я не могу сделать ни с какими другими оружиями (даже скорострелками).Еще одна неприятная вещь-бочки. Игра-просто 11 застреваний в бочках из 10. Можно при хорошем умении поставить бомбу на бочку так,что хрен её кто разминирует.
И все равно,мне реально нравится играть в это.

Counter Strike: Source. No me malentiendan, CS GO es un buen juego, pero si me preguntan: ¿Cuál es tu Counter Strike favorito?. Yo respondería sin duda CS Source, de acuerdo, sus servidores quizás no estén en un buen cuidado actualmente, pero cuando logras encontrar uno bueno (porque si los hay), el juego es muy divertido. El diseño de los personajes me parecen de los mejores, sobretodo de mi favorito, el Seal Team 6.

La jugabilidad es exquisita, personalmente me gusta un poco más que el del 1.6, y desde luego más que el de Global Offensive. Los mapas me parecen mejores, de_Aztec, de_Paris y de_Piranesi, de lejos mis mapas favoritos. El diseño de las armas están muy bien, apuntar con ellas se me hace más cómodo que la de los demás CS, aunque claro eso ya es un aspecto subjetivo. La animación de los personajes al salir volando por los aires es hilarante, cada vez que soy testigo de algún momento así, realmente me mato de la risa, el motor Source del 2004 realmente se lleva un punto muy a favor.

Counter Strike: Source es mi CS avorito y desde luego mi FPS favorito de todos. Recomiendo al 100%, cómprenlo mejor en días de oferta, no se arrepentirán.

P.S: Mencioné que los mods de Gamebanana son mejores que los que te dan las cajitas del GO? ah bueno...
